product.title: Cello Venice Plastic Bottle Set, 1 Litre, Set of 5, Assorted
product.categories_flat: Home & Kitchen > Kitchen & Dining > Kitchen Storage & Containers > Water Bottles

brand_story.title: ABOUT THE PRODUCT & THE BRAND
brand_story.description: Choose from a selection of sizes and styles to find exactly what you need to bottle up drinks to go or store prepped drinks in your fridge. Whether you're looking for small or large plastic juice bottles, Cello has what you need! We are proud of the quality materials and reliable workmanship that goes into each Cello product. We go to great lengths to create a truly superior product, but we also know that on occasion, things happen. Stay hydrated in style with a sleek bottle that takes care of your favorite drink. Cello has been with you, serving you, accompanying you for generations, in each and every space of your home, from living room to dining room, bedroom to the bathroom. You have made us a part of your family. We want to strengthen this relationship by serving you more. Our products will help you spend great times with your loved ones, by making household work an easier and enjoyable experience for you. We as a Cello Group is striving towards introducing a word-class lifestyle to every individual for an enduring relationship of trust and commitment.

videos.title: Cello Venice Exclusive Edition Plastic Water Bottle Set

feature_bullets: 100 percent Food Grade, Handle with Care - Yes
product.feature_bullets_flat: Package Contents: 5-Pieces Bottle (1 Litre). Color: Assorted, Material: Plastic. 100 percent Food Grade, Handle with Care - Yes. BPA Free. Freezer Safe and Leak Proof. Hygienic and Break Proof.

top_reviews.title: The bottles look really good and are hard also
top_reviews.body: The bottles look really good and are hard also. But the plastic rating number below the bottle is #1 (which means that it is not recommended to use regularly for drinking). For a water bottle, I don't think it is safe. Just consider this before you buy this product.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
The bottles look really good and are hard also. But the plastic rating number below the bottle is #1 (which means that it is not recommended to use regularly for drinking). For a water bottle, I don't think it is safe.
Just consider this before you buy this product.
Read more

top_reviews.title: Excellent
top_reviews.body: Really good quality stuff. We have been using them for 2 months and they still look like new. There is no deterioration as we have found with low quality plastic bottles. Taste of the water is much better in these bottles. Highly recommended.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
Really good quality stuff. We have been using them for 2 months and they still look like new. There is no deterioration as we have found with low quality plastic bottles. Taste of the water is much better in these bottles. Highly recommended.

top_reviews.title: Grade 1 plastic bottles not grade 5
top_reviews.body: The bottle is garde 1 not grade 5 if u r happy with grade 1 type bottle then go for it but the seller is telling wrong information about the grade of bottle.Read more

top_reviews.title: Don't buy , looks great but use waste
top_reviews.body: Don't buy this product , before lockdown I bought this product. It's looks really good. Bottle was strong and cool. But the main problem with that cap of bottle. It's not strong. My 6 bottles was damage on top of the bottle cap.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
Don't buy this product , before lockdown I bought this product. It's looks really good. Bottle was strong and cool. But the main problem with that cap of bottle. It's not strong. My 6 bottles was damage on top of the bottle cap.

top_reviews.title: Only buy if you want stinky water
top_reviews.body: This product is really bad. These bottles start smelling after few days of usage. I watched them many a times, dry them properly and still all efforts were in vain.. Dont waste money on this product.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
This product is really bad. These bottles start smelling after few days of usage. I watched them many a times, dry them properly and still all efforts were in vain.. Dont waste money on this product.

top_reviews.title: Premium looks.
top_reviews.body: The bottles are just awesome. Bottles are hard and have long durability. They are expensive but are worthy.  The bottles look very premium and are leak proof and also easy to clean. You will just feel the bottles worth.  Must recommended to buy.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
The bottles are just awesome. Bottles are hard and have long durability. They are expensive but are worthy.

The bottles look very premium and are leak proof and also easy to clean. You will just feel the bottles worth.

Must recommended to buy.
Read more

top_reviews.title: Beautiful looking bottles
top_reviews.body: Just got them. Bought it in lightning deal for 350/- (5 nos) loved it at the first glance. Attractive colours must say. Totally worth it. Although i do hope it will lasts after i freeze them in the freezer.Read more
